ModMetaData.name: Banana Suit
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a makeable banana suit to RimWorld for use in your colonies and scenarios.
The Banana Suit provides insolation, covers clothing, and is great at parties. Minimum Technology: Medieval Required Research: Complex clothing Armor: 30% Insulation Cold: 40% Insulation Heat: 20% + Can be used as ideology apparel + Social Impact Bonus: +15% + Kid banana suits are available for Biotech Costs: 80 Leather / Fabric, 1 Dye
